name: Love Is Waifu (Demo/Initial Release)
description:
This game's demo was completed for NaNoRenO 2022

Synopsis:

Love is Waifu is a game about dating cute waifus!

Current Features

-Around 4,000 words (short)

-1 Waifu 

-Customizable Player (name, gender, etc.)

-7 conversations, and many questions to ask the Waifu!

-Epic soundtrack!

Future plans:

-At least 100,000 words

-5 waifus

-DnD subgame

-Minigames

-Dates with waifus!

-Secret character???

_-AND MUCH MORE!

We will be posting updates as soon as they are available. Please check weekly for newest version  Current update notes will be listed below.

Bug Fix- KassidyAngry.png was not sized properly.

Our Amazing Team!

Lialinn - Our incredible artist! They did a fantastic job, and has been super helpful and amazing during this whole process, I feel honored to get to work with them!

AcridBrimistic - Our lovely composer! I love the music they were able to supply us with, thank you so much!

Jumatsuga- Our lovely co-writer! They did so well capturing the waifu's personality, and I am so glad they are on our team!

ShatteredReality- The amazing programmer! They were a ton of help with bug fixes, in which there were so many, and helped us out so much! Can't wait to add minigames with you!

L.(sageleif/sappirefire) - Me! I was a co-writer, co-programmer, and team leader, although I was nothing without my amazing team to back me up!

Thank you all so much!

And thank you to everyone that plays this game! We've all put so much work into it, and we are super grateful for your support. Please let us know your thoughts, and if you have any suggestions!
